name: spotify-autoplaylist
description: 1. Go to the __auth-server__ folder 2. Create a `.env` file with the following variables:     ```      CLIENT_ID=     CLIENT_SECRET=     REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost:8888/callback     ```     You can get the `CLIENT_ID` and `CLIENT_SECRET` from https://developer.spotify.com/. For now we can use our own applications but we will probably need a central one later. Make sure to add the `REDIRECT_URI` to the spotify app
